entries.text: State Farm provides official customer care pages for existing customers, including access to customer support paths.
State Farm has a separate official claims experience for reporting and managing claims, distinct from general customer care pages.
State Farm customer care and billing guidance pages cover billing/payment support, often requiring customers to choose the right path before getting help.
State Farm's FAQs provide separate support information and self-service guidance for insurance servicing topics.
JD Power's 2025 U.S. Claims Digital Experience Study highlights continued channel switching and inadequate proactive digital updates during claims across P&C insurance.

current_strengths: Dedicated claims experience and customer care pages
current_gaps_observed_or_likely: Claims, billing, and support paths remain separated across multiple surfaces
No public evidence of one continuous support thread across voice/chat/handoff
No public customer-visible request tracker across customer-care and claims conversations
No public proactive support orchestration layer for claim follow-up and issue recovery
